summary: Ecosystem encompasses the expansive nature of structures that extend beyond traditional geographic and time constraints. Drawing from biological roots, it applies to dynamic and diverse human organizations enabled by modern technology. These structures advocate for non-hierarchical, organic interactions and necessitate innovative models such as Ecosystem Architecture to thrive in contemporary settings.
excerpt: Ecosystems signify a move to non-hierarchical structures. They transcend geography and require new models like Ecosystem Architecture to thrive.
